channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Font Awesome 4 Menus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Font Awesome 4 Menus

item.title: CVE-2022-3829|2024-08-03T01:20:58.480Z -- unknown -- font%20awesome%204%20menus
item.description: The Font Awesome 4 Menus WordPress plugin through 4.7.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
